review.comment:
Dr Reza Nassab has totally changed my life!
He is an outstanding surgeon and this is shown not only through his results but also his personality. He listened and advised me on the very best decision based on what i told him i wanted. He made me feel at ease throughout the whole process and i am so happy with my results. I had breast augmentation and choosing Dr Nassab was the best decision i ever made. I couldn’t fault a single thing, from the consultation process, day of surgery and to the post op appointment. His secretary & the hospital team are also just as amazing and i couldn’t thank them all enough. I have (& will continue) to recommend him to anyone wanting the same procedure.

Wow - why would you go anywhere else. I had a fantastic experience from consultation right through to aftercare. During the consultation I didn't feel rushed and really extremely well informed to support my decision making. I felt like I was the only patient that day which helped to calm my nerves and give me the confidence to know I had made the right decision. The hospital setting was fantastic, far far better than other private hospitals I have visited and the theatre and nursing staff were amazing, so chatty and friendly. The results speak for themselves, I had augmentation and at 47 years of age I am wearing dresses without a bra for the first time ever and I feel so much more confident with my appearance. Mr Nassab is a true credit to his profession, a kind a gentle man and an absolute treasure through and through. His results speak for themselves, I would urge anyone even considering surgery to seek a consultation with him. PS I must also mention his secretary Faye she is a superstar too!

After spending many years dreaming of having a breast augmentation, i finally plucked up the courage to go for a consultation in Wilmslow with Mr Nassab (in my mind,thinking it would never happen)
However, the consultation was informative, professional and put me at ease straight away with his friendly and calming persona. The whole team at the Wilmslow hospital were absolutely faultless and considering i have never been under general anaesthetic before, i felt totally calm throughout the entire process. My results are fantastic and it has changed my life, i would highly recommend Mr Nassab to anyone considering a breast augmentation.

Mr Reza Nassab is the most excellent surgeon, he made me feel at ease through the whole process and was happy to answer all my questions however silly they might of seemed. I am now 8 weeks post op and I could not be happier with the results. I can honestly say they are perfect. Could not recommend Mr Reza Nassab and his team in Wilmslow enough.
Mr Nassab is calm & reassuring, giving you every confidence in his ability. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend or to return.

Dr Nassab is a fantastic surgeon who makes you feel very confident in his abilities and at ease. He is a true professional who knows what he is talking about and will advise you on the very best decision.
I had breast augmentation and could not be happier with the results. If I had any questions I was able to message him and get an immediate response. You wouldn't normally get this with other surgeons.
I have friends and work colleagues who have now had the same procedure as me with Dr Nassab and they too are thrilled with their results.
Would definitely recommend him to anyone wanting breast augmentation.
